title: Intelligent Patent Analysis System Using Machine Learning

specification.description: The present invention relates to a system and method for intelligent patent analysis using machine learning techniques. The system automatically analyzes patent documents to identify novelty, inventive step, and potential prior art references. The system includes natural language processing modules, classification algorithms, and similarity analysis tools. The invention aims to improve the efficiency and accuracy of patent examination processes by providing automated assistance to patent examiners. Key features include automated claim analysis, prior art searching, and examination recommendation generation.

claims.claim_text: An intelligent patent analysis system comprising: a natural language processing module for extracting technical features from patent documents; a machine learning model trained to identify patentability criteria; and a recommendation engine for generating examination reports.
The system of claim 1, wherein the machine learning model uses deep learning techniques to analyze patent content.

A method for automated patent analysis using the system of claim 1, the method comprising: receiving a patent application; processing the application using natural language processing; generating patentability scores using the machine learning model; and producing examination recommendations.
The method of claim 3, wherein the patentability scores include novelty score, inventive step score, and industrial applicability score.

abstract: An intelligent patent analysis system using machine learning techniques for automated examination of patent applications. The system includes natural language processing modules for feature extraction, machine learning models for patentability assessment, and recommendation engines for generating examination reports. The invention improves the efficiency and accuracy of patent examination by providing automated analysis of novelty, inventive step, and prior art references. The system can process applications in multiple languages and provides detailed explanation of examination decisions.

drawings.description: System architecture diagram showing the main components of the intelligent patent analysis system
Flowchart illustrating the patent analysis process steps
User interface diagram showing the examination recommendation display
